attributes.action: accept that the country has zero confidence in g. brown as PM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: that a general election should & must be immediately set & called asap so that we, the electorate, can vote in a gov't of our own choosing. the nation has lost all confidence, trust & faith in this current new labour gov't & should not, in a democratic country, have to languish under such misrule

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
